caption: The food we had was very tasty although a bit greasy. It was generous in size and ingredients were good quality. But my order was cancelled last night. Even thought I ordered hours in advance my order didn’t arrive. Doordash said they had closed and it was only 6PM! I actually tried ordering from this place one more time. Doordash took the order and the time for delivery. When it came time to be delivered they cancelled again without warning. I made my own delicious melted cheese sandwich in my cast iron pan and it was better than theirs. I will never order from such an unreliable place again. (Los Angeles restaurant)

Classic Grilled Cheese Combo $10.95, includes one side and a drink. But they manage to leave out the part that you have to extra for the side and the drink. The Classic Grilled Cheese by itself is $8.95. So one could say they are charging you an extra $2.00 for the sandwich, if you want a combo. What a rip off!!!

Don't order from here, as an uber delivery guy, this place has 3 different names. The staff doesn't care they move slow motion 30min to give the food to the delivery guy, they have a super rude attitude. They refuse to communicate and respond, disrespectful, they refuse to communicate and let him know when the food is ready. Personally i took 2 orders because i didn't know they have many business names under the same business. I would never go there and get your food from them again. Never ever.
The slices of bread are smaller than your standard supermarket loaves. I was surprised at how flat my grilled cheese was. Honestly a pity for the price.
A crispy bread, and hits just the spot when you're looking for grilled cheese.
Classless Name
they didnt grill my cheese like they said they wouldnt
How do you miss adding cheese to a grilled cheese sandwich?

Fries are absolutely wonderful!! But adding avocado means getting a strange Taco Bell like guacamole mush placed upon that which is sacred (the grilled cheese) There were tomato bits-  tomatoes are not part of avocado :( Is this part of the cheeky name? A gimmick I’m not aware of? I’m confused and sad over the loss of cheese.

If I could give a 0 star I would but unfortunately that’s not one of my options here. I saw this as a option on Uber eats and decided to try it out, since I love grill cheese. Can someone tell me why they did not grill my cheese? Who was gonna melt for me? I thought I order a grill cheese yet I got wheat bread which i didn’t even ask for and 4 slices of cheese not melted in between like who and why would I want this ? I’m truly disappointed I saw the other reviews and thought let me try for myself. I regret ever trying I definitely made my own grill cheese after this experience. I will never buy from this place again or recommend it!
Ordered last night. This place is delicious. Do not understand the negative comments. If you don’t want food with grease, go order a salad, not grilled cheese.
I have not eaten here but the name is awesome. I do plan on trying them out

Absolutely terrible. Ordered grown up grilled cheese, which has 3 types of cheese and added bacon for $2. Received a sandwhich that was a single slice of cheddar with a slice of tomato and some sort of seeds (and no bacon). Can't even find the item on the menu that matches. Bread was also dry as hell and tasted like it was grilled dry (as in no butter). Bacon cheese fries was a big pile of generic steak fries covered in cheap cheese sauce. Least this actually had bacon. Couldn't even finish the sandwich it was so bad and couldn't eat more than a few fries. Total waste of money.

if you go to ANY delivery ap, when you go to choose the specific sandwich, it forces you to add more items to the sandwich for more money or you can't add the item to your cart and complete the order. So a $9 sandwich becomes $10-$13 before you even ordered. I refuse to use them at all. It's so shady it's not even funny.
Pretty good but hard to find as its actually part of a different restaurant

First off, a simple grilled cheese for $10 is definitely too much for two bread and a slap of cheese. Second, partner and I definitely ordered for the memes but it truly wasn’t worth the price. If they give me Kraft Mac&Cheese for the “Mac Attack”, at least make it the Spongebob Mac and cheese  Thank you for wasting my time and my money. Restaurant and Door Dash.  The store location is in Secaucus on DoorDash.

Omg ordered this from DoorDash and was a decision I regret. The sandwich was so greasy and just overall gross. They even messed up my fries like how do you mess up fries. Made a review on DoorDash to warn others not to waste their money and it’s not showing up. Places like this should close there doors forever!!!!

Ordered for delivery a BBQ Chicken cheese sandwich, with side order of tater tots.  There were no tater tots in the delivery. I complained to DoorDash and that part of what I had been charged was refunded.  I also ordered bacon to be included in the sandwich. No sign of bacon anywhere to be seen upon delivery.  And finally, I must say this sandwich was definitely the single most disgusting grease bomb I have ever, ever, EVER, had the displeasure of handling. Totally unable to finish it.

The bbq chicken grilled cheese was good.  Going back for another, not sure same sandwich.  The chicken isn't bbq, just cover in bbq sauce which was disappointing.  Also the caramelized onions where maybe translucent but no where near caramelized.

DON’T WASTE  YOUR MONEY!!! I ordered on Uber eats and they sent me an ungrilled grilled cheese It was slightly melted cheese with buttered bread. The description for the grilled cheese I ordered had caramelized onions and the put raw onions with sugar.
